actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to limit certain aspects of its coverage for other than racial groups.
short_title: Voting Rights Act Repealer Amendments Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Voting Rights Act Repealer Amendments Act - Repeals titles II and III of Public Law 94-73, an act to amend the voting Rights Act of 1965. Ends the extension (through title III of Pub. Law 94-73) of the Voting Rights Act to jurisdictions where more than five percent of the citizens of voting age in the jurisdiction are of a single language minority. Ends the requirement (imposed by title II of Pub. Law 94-73) that such jurisdiction provide registration and voting materials to minority groups in the language of such group.

titles.title: Voting Rights Act Repealer Amendments Act
A bill to amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to limit certain aspects of its coverage for other than racial groups.
